name: The Superior Collection Volume 1
overview: A compilation of 8 games published in cassette and floppy disk formats, 7 of which were previously released as stand alone titles by Superior Software. Syncron was a new release; a cassette version was later published on the Superior/Blue Ribbon budget label. Airlift, a single player scrolling action rescue game by Peter Johnson (1984) BMX on the Moon, a single player Moon Buggy style game by Tim Tyler and Ian Robinson (1984) Karate Combat, a fighting game for up to 2 players by Martin Sykes (1986) Repton, a single player scrolling maze game by Tim Tyler (1985) Star Striker, a single player gallery space shooter by Jim Daniels (1984) Smash and Grab, a single player platformer by Walter Mansell (1984) Syncron, a single player scrolling shooter by Gary Partis (1987) Wallaby, a single player platformer by Peter Johnson and David Lovekin (1984)
